about.title: About us
about.desc: For comfortable education and leisure, we unite children in small, comfortable groups, which are divided by age categories as well as educational directions. Individual approach to each child. No more than 10 students per class. In-depth study of English. In addition, we send our children abroad for language practice. Classes from 8:00 to 17:00; 3 balanced meals a day (optional), homework assistance.
